sent.orig: I put my hand over my mouth to muffle my words, so only my friend could hear.
sent.trans: 我把手挡在嘴上，遮住声音，仅让我的朋友听到。

sent.orig: Stop talking to me like a Dutch uncle about my duty to my family, my school, and my country.
sent.trans: 别再拿家庭、学校、国家的义务来教训我啦！

sent.orig: My duty to my family lies before my own interests.
sent.trans: 我的家庭责任比我的个人利益更重要。

sent.orig: Scenes of the past rose before my eyes.; The past came back to my mind.; My mind flashed back to scenes of the past.
